A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had hopes that Disney took a step forward but tragically this was a lot worse than I could’ve imagined. Cheesy humor\, horrible and I mean horrible directing.. weird pacing.. obvious rehashing of OT in parts. Disney spend some time really paying attention to EP 5 and 6 when they took it more seriously. Enough trying to make it a Disney story.. so disappointing
